items.sentence: Tom said he wished that he'd kissed Mary goodbye.
Tom said he wished that he hadn't let Mary drive.
Tom told everybody that he was afraid to do that.
Tom told me he didn't want me to do that anymore.
Tom told me he wasn't used to speaking in public.
Tom told me he was able to speak three languages.
I enjoyed the time I spent in Australia with you.
Tom is waiting for someone else to do it for him.
Mary is wearing the ugliest dress I've ever seen.
Mary looked absolutely gorgeous in her new dress.
Everybody started hugging and kissing each other.
The shirt that you're wearing is really wrinkled.
How about starting again from the very beginning?
Do you believe that people are capable of change?
What do you think of when you look at this photo?
Is it true that you breast-fed all your children?
The bomb caused a lot of damage when it exploded.
Rice is cultivated in several parts of the world.
The mayor didn't like what the journalists wrote.
When I went to look, I found the boy fast asleep.
